alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Polk; Story (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 4:57AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Polk, south central Story and northeastern Dallas Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 456 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Grimes, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. A personal weather station near Dallas Center reported a wind gust of 42 mph around 450 AM. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Windsor Heights, Merle Hay Mall and Saylorville Lake around 505 AM CDT. Johnston and Polk City around 510 AM CDT. Des Moines and Saylorville around 515 AM CDT. Ankeny around 520 AM CDT and Altoona and Bondurant around 530 AM CDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 87 and 102. Interstate 80 between mile markers 125 and 147. Interstate 235 between mile markers 13 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
